701793f-b.title: Bronx: Shore Drive - Layton Avenue
701793f-b.text:
(1)
Shore Drive (running from left, where automobile is seen, to
extreme right, where man and automobile appeag), at and adjoining
the S.E. corner of Layton Ave., showing Judge's bathing beach. On
the extreme right is Judge's Hotel.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, from a different angle. The space
where automobiles are parked is on the grounds of the private beach on
Eastchester Bay.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701793f-b.folder: Shore Drive & Layton Avenue, Bronx, NY
